capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: The role requires self-motivation and a measured approach in a fast-paced environment, with a commitment to learning about the division's operations.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Effective communication is essential for coordinating administrative tasks and reporting activities within the division.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The officer is expected to efficiently manage financial and administrative tasks to support the division's operations.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Planning and prioritising are crucial for managing various administrative tasks and supporting the division's compliance and operational needs.

capabilities.name: Finance
capabilities.description: Understanding and applying financial processes is necessary for handling budgets, expenditures, and financial reporting.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Proficiency in computer-based systems and content management systems is required for effective administration.

capabilities.name: Procurement and Contract Management
capabilities.description: Basic knowledge of procurement processes is needed for the preparation of purchase orders and managing contracts.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.description: Preparing and managing financial reports, budgets, and expenditure.

skills.name: Content Management Systems
skills.description: Using systems like Content Manager (CM10) for effective document and content management.

skills.name: Procurement Processes
skills.description: Understanding and applying procurement and contract management processes.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.description: Adapting to a constantly changing environment and managing multiple tasks efficiently.

generalRole.name: Administration Support Officer
generalRole.title: Administration Support Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves providing essential business coordination and administration services to support the operations of a division, including financial management, procurement, and technology utilization.
